title: Drawing, Design for  Mahogany Dining Table, 1900–05
medium: Graphite and yellow color pencil on thin, cream paper
markings: Watermark across verso bottom : ORIENTAL LINEN
inscribed: In graphite above upper right of design, wih an arrow pointing to table top: "Top 4'-6" diam";  in graphite, in lower right corner of sheet: "Dining Table/of Mahogany"; in graphite at lower right of design, with an arrow pointing to the leg foot: "Brass claw feet".
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Round table top raised on short cylindrical support sitting on round base on four splayed legs terminating in brass animal-paw feet on casters indicated in yellow color pencil.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for  Mahogany Dining Table, 1900–05. Graphite and yellow color pencil on thin, cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-98
